wikipedia_page.main: Stuart Fraser (born 1 August 1978) is a former footballer who played in the Football League for Exeter City and Stoke City.

response: * Stuart Fraser (diplomat) (1864–1963), officer of the Foreign and Political Department of the Government of India
* Stuart Fraser (politician) politician in the City of London Corporation
* Stuart Fraser (footballer, born 1978), English football player (Exeter City, Stoke City)
* Stuart Fraser (footballer, born 1980), Scottish football player (Luton Town, Stevenage)
